程序包 com.milotnt.controller

类 EmployeeController

java.lang.Object
com.milotnt.controller.EmployeeController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/employee") public class EmployeeController extends Object
类名：EmployeeController 说明：员工控制器类，用于处理与"employee"相关的请求
